title: Windows Vista to Windows 7 Lag
body: Hi, I've been running Windows Vista on my computer since I started played league in season 3 (Yes vista is old af I know). I have always had pretty decent ping when playing LoL, generally 70-80. But when I updated my computer to Windows 7 I've seen a ridiculous rise in my ping. From 70-80 to pretty much always having 400 or higher. I have updated completely for Windows 7, went on multiple internet testing sites and they said my internet was fine. I don't know what to do as I can't play LoL pretty much now, if you can help me in any way it would be much appreciated.

replies.body:
Did you [**reconfigure your network settings for League**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) after completing this upgrade to Windows 7? When you install a new Operating System, your settings will be set at default values, so you'll want to ensure you aren't running any network settings that would conflict with League.

Let me know if those steps caused any change for you.
